name: Soothe & Riot: The Luthadel Table
description: A single-player strategy game where you play as a Mistborn at the Luthadel game table. Use the Allomantic arts of Brass and Zinc to manipulate the emotions of your noble opponents. Soothe their fears or inflame their envy to influence their trades. Your goal is to collect a full set of four identical Shard cards before they do.
